## Posit Team Dedicated

Posit Team Dedicated is a Single-Tenant SaaS distribution. PTD offers an enterprise customer the governance and compliance story of self-hosted products, with the convenience of SaaS. The pricing is based on both licenses + management fee. PTD includes the full team suite (Workbench, Connect, Package Manager, Chronicle), configured to work together seamlessly. A customer can choose both their cloud and their region.
